ISSUE.TITLE: Drone Dockerfile build fails missing package rsrc.
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: I'm on a fresh checkout of drone (40fe4305815dd898ffbeeccee2f5bdd979896d72) I get this error: ``` bash Step 11 : RUN make ---> Running in a5344ae88a06 cd cmd/droned/assets && find js -name "*.js" ! -name '.*' ! -name "main.js" -exec cat {} \; > js/main.js go install github.com/GeertJohan/go.rice/rice ../../GeertJohan/go.rice/rice/writecoff.go:5:2: cannot find package "github.com/akavel/rsrc/binutil" in any of: /go/src/pkg/github.com/akavel/rsrc/binutil (from $GOROOT) /gocode/src/github.com/akavel/rsrc/binutil (from $GOPATH) ../../GeertJohan/go.rice/rice/embed-syso.go:8:2: cannot find package "github.com/akavel/rsrc/coff" in any of: /go/src/pkg/github.com/akavel/rsrc/coff (from $GOROOT) /gocode/src/github.com/akavel/rsrc/coff (from $GOPATH) make: *** [rice] Error 1 2014/06/07 15:20:23 The command [/bin/sh -c make] returned a non-zero code: 2 ``` If I check that out into vendor, it all works. I suggest adding it to .gitmodules.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: feat: [CODE-133]: add sort filters and active state (#347)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: feat: [code-101]: fix icons on system update (#348)
